snippet.title: Trine 4 Expansion - Melody of Mystery PC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Continue the journey of Amadeus, Pontius, and Zoya in the Melody of Mystery, a 6-level expansion for Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince available now. Download it here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/690640/Trine_4_The_Nightmare_Prince/

The new adventure features new upgrades for the heroes' skills, and new puzzles with new gameplay elements for our heroes to take on. 

Follow Us on Twitter: https://modus.games/twitter
Like Us on Facebook: https://modus.games/facebook
Join our Discord: https://modus.games/discord
